content: stitches on that needle knit 30 36 42 stitches across the top of the foot until you reach the next heel flap split these stitches between 2 needles pick up 12 13 15 stitches on that side and knit remaining 9 11 13 stitches rounds now start at the bottom of the foot 72 86 98 stitches total if using circular needles knit 9 11 13 place marker this is now where new row start knit 9 11 13 pick up 12 13 15 stitches along the edge of the heel flap place marker knit across the front of the foot 30 36 42 stitches place marker pick up 12 13 15 stitches along the edge of the heel flap when the pattern refers to stitches on the first needle those are the stitches between the first two markers 72 86 98 stitches total when the pattern refers to the stitches on the fourth needle those are the stitches between the second marker and the end of the row row 1 knit 18 21 25 st or until there are 3 stitches left on the first needle k2tog k1 knit across instep stitches on the fourth needle k1 ssk knit to end row 2 knit all stitches 70 84 96 repeat row 1& 2 an additional 5 6 6 times until 60 72 84 stitches remain foot - start in main color end in contrast color knit until the foot measures 4 inches less than the desired length the rest of the pattern should add 2 to the sock if knit at gauge i suggest measuring the colorwork section on the ankle 37 row plus 9 11 13 row and adjusting accordingly if you re not knitting at gauge when in doubt start the colorwork earlier rather than later it s better to have to knit a few extra row with the cc before shaping the toe than to make the sock too long and have to redo the entire colorwork section work color chart b 37 row toe - contrast color the toe decreases are worked over 9 11 13 row row 1 knit to last 3 stitches on first needle k2tog k1 on the next needle k1 ssk knit across knit to last three stitches on the third needle k2tog k1 on the fourth needle k1 ssk knit across 4 stitches decreased row 2 knit across repeat row one and two until 24 28 32 stitches remain combine the stitches on needles 1 and 4 and 2 and 3 the top of the foot should be on one needle the bottom on the other 12 14 16 stitches on each needle graft the remaining stitches to close the toe and sew in the ends all done chart a chart b main color white contrast color green
